articles.author: Maya Phillips
articles.title: 'Birthday Candles' Review: Another Year, Another Cake, Another Profundity - The New York Times
articles.description: Debra Messing expounds on the preciousness of life in a production that aspires to convey eloquent whimsy, but too often feels methodically sentimental.
articles.content: As she bakes, the details of her life fill in around her: Family members and friends enter and exit, are born and die. With a chime her high school crush, Matt (John Earl Jelks), becomes her husband.… [+1151 chars]

articles.title: Camila Cabello Gets Edgy in Fishnets, Hot Pants and Thigh-High Boots on ‘Saturday Night Live’ - Footwear News

articles.content:
Camila Cabello went dark for her latest performance on “Saturday Night Live” last night.
